name: Ciqineq Receptors
text: ACTION: Exhaust this card to draw 2 event cards. Place 1 into your hand and shuffle the other back into the deck.

name: Gjen Specter II
text:
Cost 1(x2), Combat 7
This unit does not count against capacity.
Up to 4 of this unit can be transported on each non-fighter ship.
At the start of a space combat, you may remove up to 3 infantry from the space area of the active system. For each 1 that you remove, your opponent must assign 1 hit to their ships.

name: Stellar Corridors
text: At the end of your turn you may remove 1 of your command tokens from a system that does not contain a planet owned by another player. If you do, return this card to your technology deck.

name: Nexus Grid
text: After you activate a system, you may exhaust this card to treat the active system as if it contains every type of wormhole.

name: Murmuration
text: At the start of your turn, you may purge this card. If you do, you may remove any number of your ships from the gameboard and then place them in any systems that do not contain another player's ships.

name: Fibrile Realignment
text: ACTION: Exhaust this card to discard either one secret objective or one action card. Then, draw a new card of the same type.

name: Precision Targeting
text: At the start of a round of combat you may exhaust this card to cause your opponents' units participating in that combat that have SUSTAIN DAMAGE to become damaged.

name: Synthetic Reclamation
text: When 1 or more of your units produces units, you may remove infantry from that system. For each infantry that you remove, reduce the combined cost of the produced units by 1.

name: Leviathan Eruptor
text: At the end of a combat round, you may exhaust this card to return 1 captured unit and place a unit of the same type from your reinforcements in the active system.

name: Antimass Deflectors
text: Your ships can move into and through asteroid fields. When other players' units use SPACE CANNON against your units, apply -2 to the result of each die roll.

name: Gravity Drive
text: After you activate a system, you may exhaust this card to apply +1 to the move value of your ships during this tactical action.

name: Fleet Logistics
text: During each of your turns of the action phase, you may perform 2 actions instead of 1.

name: Light/Wave Deflector
text: After you activate a system, you may exhaust this card to allow your ships to move through systems that contain other players' ship during this tactical action.

name: Neural Motivator
text: During your turn, you may exhaust this card to draw one action card.

name: Dacxive Animators
text: At the start of a round of ground combat, you may exhaust this card. If you do, for each infantry destroyed in that combat round place an infantry token on this card. At the end of the combat round, place 1 infantry from your reinforcements on the planet for each token on this card.

name: Hyper Metabolism
text: You may exhaust this card at the end of your turn to gain one command token.

name: X-89 Bacterial Weapon
text: After the space cannon defense step of a planetary invasion, you may exhaust this card to destroy all of your opponent's infantry on that planet. Then, roll 1 die for each of your infantry on that planet. For each result of 6 or greater, destroy 1 of those units.

name: Bio-Stims
text: You may exhaust this card at the end of your turn to ready 1 of your planets that has a technology specialty or 1 of your other technologies.

name: Plasma Scoring
text: When 1 or more of your units use BOMBARDMENT, ANTI-FIGHTER BARRAGE, or SPACE CANNON, 1 of those units may roll 1 additional die.

name: Transit Diodes
text: You may exhaust this card at the start of your turn during the action phase; remove up to 4 of your ground forces from the game board and place them on 1 or more planets you control.

name: Predictive Intelligence
text:
At the end of your turn, you may exhaust this card to redistribute your command tokens.
When you cast votes during the agenda phase, you may cast 3 additional votes.

name: War Sun
text:
Cost 10, Combat 3(x3), Move 2, Capacity 8
SUSTAIN DAMAGE, BOMBARDMENT 3(x3)
Other players' units in this system lose PLANETARY SHIELD.

name: Space Dock II
text:
PRODUCTION X
This unit's PRODUCTION value is equal to 5 more than the resource or influence value of this planet.
Up to 6 fighters in this system do not count against your ships' capacity.

name: L4 Disruptors
text: At the start of a space combat you may exhaust this card. If you do, the other player cannot retreat or resolve abilities that would move their ships during this combat.

name: Prototype War Sun II
text:
Cost 10, Combat 3(x3), Move 2, Capacity 8
SUSTAIN DAMAGE, BOMBARDMENT 3(x3)
Other players' units in this system lose PLANETARY SHIELD.
This unit cannot be destroyed by "Direct Hit" action cards.

name: Crimson Legionnaire II
text:
Cost 1(x2), Combat 7
After this unit is destroyed, gain 1 commodity or convert 1 of your commodities to a trade good.
You may produce 1 additional infantry for their cost. These infantry do not count against your PRODUCTION limit.

name: Spatial Conduit Cylinders
text: You may treat all systems that contain your structures as adjacent.

name: Lazax Gate Folding
text: During your tactical actions, treat the Mecatol Rex system as if it contains each non-delta wormhole.

name: Bioplasmosis
text:
ACTION: Exhaust this card to place 1 infantry on up to 3 planets that you control.
At the start of the action phase, you may choose 1 system. Resolve each of your unit’s Production abilities in that system.

name: Spec Ops II
text: You may produce 1 additional infantry for their cost. These infantry do not count against your PRODUCTION limit.

name: Inheritance Systems
text: ACTION: Exhaust this card and spend 6 resources to research a technology.

name: E-Res Siphons
text: After another player activates a system that contains 1 or more of your ships, gain 3 trade goods.

name: Infantry II
text:
Cost 1(x2), Combat 7
You may produce 1 additional infantry for their cost. These infantry do not count against your PRODUCTION limit.

name: Hegemonic Trade Policy
text: Exhaust this card when 1 or more of your units use PRODUCTION; swap the resource and influence values of 1 planet you control until the end of your turn.

name: Impulse Core
text: When you or your opponent resolve a retreat, you may produce a hit and assign it to one of your opponent's ships in the active system.
